title: Inspect srtp_core_30s.bag: list topics, message counts, time span; export a summary report
description:
Goal: Inspect srtp_core_30s.bag and generate a summary report.

Requirements:
- Detect environment: Windows PowerShell / WSL / ROS availability
- If ROS is available: run rosbag info and capture:
  - start time, end time, duration
  - list of topics
  - per-topic message type + message count (and freq if possible)
- Export results to: bag_summary.md (human readable)
- Also save raw command output to: bag_info.txt
- Do not modify the original bag file.

Done when:
- bag_summary.md and bag_info.txt exist and are committed.
notes: Inspected srtp_core_30s.bag environment. Windows PowerShell has no rosbag command, and WSL/ROS is unavailable on this machine, so rosbag info could not run. Added bag_info.txt (raw command output) and bag_summary.md (clean summary + known topics from project context).
